definition.de: Sportliche Aktivität in den Bergen, schließt das Klettern und Wandern ein
definition.en-GB: Sportive activities in the mountains including climbing and hiking
definition.en-US: Sportive activities in the mountains including climbing and hiking
definition.pt-BR: Atividades esportivas em montanhas, incluindo escalada e caminhada.
definition.pt-PT: Atividades desportivas em montanhas, incluindo escalada e caminhada.
definition.zh-Hans: 在山区进行的体育活动，包括登山和徒步旅行
